T02D3685:315a-2: # // rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3685:315a-3: de la dang por sngags pas gdong bkru ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3685:315a-4: yid dang mthun par bsam gtan gyi gnas gtsang zhing
T02D3685:315a-5: dri zhim po gcal du bkram par stan gtsang ma
T02D3685:315a-6: la bde bar skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste 'byung
T02D3685:315a-7: po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags kyis gtor ma
T02D3685:315a-9: aom a'a bi ghn'anta krita h'um phat /
T02D3685:315a-10: ces bya ba'i sngags lan bcu'i bar du brjod de /
T02D3685:315a-11: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
T02D3685:315a-12: de nas rang gi snying gar chos thams cad chod
T02D3685:315a-13: dbyings kyi rang bzhin skye ba med par ston par
T02D3685:315a-14: byed pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba 'od
T02D3685:315a-15: zer dkar po 'phro bas rang gi lus gsal bar
T02D3685:315a-16: byed pa shin tu 'phro ba bsams la /
T02D3685:315a-17: de yongs su gyur pa'i 'od dkar po'i thig le
T02D3685:315a-18: shel skong dag pa lta bu de rim gyis 'phel
T02D3685:315a-19: bar gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs su
T02D3685:315a-20: bsam zhing / de'i steng du yi ge t'am 'od
T02D3685:315a-21: zer gyi tshogs 'phro ba'i rin po che'i sgron ma
T02D3685:315a-22: ltar dkar ba rnam par bsam mo //
T02D3685:315a-23: de nas yi ge t'am de 'od zer shin tu
T02D3685:315a-24: dkar ba'i tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D3685:315a-25: gsal bar byas pa sngon du 'gro bas lha mo
T02D3685:315a-26: sgrol ma la sogs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D3685:315a-27: sems dpa' dang bla ma rnams bskul te /
T02D3685:315a-28: spyan drangs pa mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs la rnam par bsam par bya'o //
T02D3685:315a-29: de'i steng du yid kyis rang bzhin gyi mchod par bya ba yin la /
T02D3685:315a-30: de la mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D3685:315b-0: aom badzra pushpe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod @315b
T02D3685:315b-1: la yi ge t'am las byung ba'i me tog gi
T02D3685:315b-2: mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3685:315b-3: de nas aom badzra dh'u pe h'um zhes bya ba'i
T02D3685:315b-4: sngags brjod la yi ge t'am de nyid las yang
T02D3685:315b-5: dag par spros pa'i bdug pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs kyis
T02D3685:315b-6: mchod par bya'o // de'i 'og tu aom badzra d'i
T02D3685:315b-7: pe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge
T02D3685:315b-8: t'am de nyid las rin po che'i sgron ma spros
T02D3685:315b-10: de nas aom badzra gandhe h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags
T02D3685:315b-11: brjod la yi ge t'am de nyid las byung ba'i
T02D3685:315b-12: dri'i mchod pa'i sprin yang dag par spros pas mchod
T02D3685:315b-13: par bya'o // de nas aom badzra ni bi dye
T02D3685:315b-14: h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge t'am
T02D3685:315b-15: de nyid las rin po che sna tshogs bcug pa'i
T02D3685:315b-16: lha'i zhal zas ro mchog dang ldan pa'i mchod pa'i
T02D3685:315b-17: sprin rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par spros pas
T02D3685:315b-18: par bya'o // mchod par bya'o // de nas aom
T02D3685:315b-19: sarbba bi shishta p'u dza me gha pra sa ra
T02D3685:315b-21: zhes bya ba'i sngags brjod la yi ge t'am de
T02D3685:315b-22: nyid las rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang
T02D3685:315b-26: bla re la sogs pa dang /
T02D3685:315b-27: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o //
T02D3685:315b-28: de ltar mchod pa byas nas /
T02D3685:315b-29: de dag gi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D3685:315b-30: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang bskul ba dang /
T02D3685:315b-32: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D3685:315b-33: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas la /
T02D3685:315b-34: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
T02D3685:315b-35: snyoms te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms nas byang chub
T02D3685:315b-37: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarbba dharm'a:sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02D3685:315b-38: zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum brjod la /
T02D3685:315b-39: 'gro ba thams cad rmi lam dang sgyu ma dang
T02D3685:315b-40: smig rgyu lta bur stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D3685:315b-42: de nas yi ge aa yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam /
T02D3685:315b-43: de'i steng du yi ge t'am dkar po las 'od zer dkar po 'khrigs par bsam /
T02D3685:315b-44: de yongs su gyur pa las autpa la sngon po /
T02D3685:316a-0: de'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil @316a * //
T02D3685:316a-1: 'khor gyi steng na yi ge t'am dkar po bsam /
T02D3685:316a-2: de las 'od zer dkar po phyogs bcur 'phros pa
T02D3685:316a-3: des sems can thams cad sbyangs nas lha mo sgrol
T02D3685:316a-4: ma'i skur gyur pa 'od zer de nyid kyis bkug
T02D3685:316a-5: / autpal dang yi ge t'am la bstims pas ;
T02D3685:316a-6: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
T02D3685:316a-7: zla ba'i gzugs kyi gdan steng du //
T02D3685:316a-8: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas ni //
T02D3685:316a-9: mchog sbyin ma dang autpal bsnams //
T02D3685:316a-10: ston ka'i zla ba'i mdangs 'dra ba'i //
T02D3685:316a-11: zla ba la ni rgyab brten pa //
T02D3685:316a-12: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02D3685:316a-13: bcu drug lo lon lus dang ldan //
T02D3685:316a-14: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de 'dra'i sras //
T02D3685:316a-16: 'phags ma sgrol ma de'i snying gar zla ba'i steng gi t'am dkar po yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D3685:316a-18: rtsibs brgyad pa la yi ge ni //
T02D3685:316a-19: brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba la //
T02D3685:316a-20: lte bar aom t'a'i yi ge yi //
T02D3685:316a-21: dbus gnas bsgrub bya'i ming dang ldan //
T02D3685:316a-22: zla drug bsten zhing nges pa ni //
T02D3685:316a-23: rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis bsgom //
T02D3685:316a-24: yi ge bcu po'i sngags 'di ni //
T02D3685:316a-25: skyo bar ma gyur sems kyis bzlas //
T02D3685:316a-26: dang por aom ni bzhag nas su//
T02D3685:316a-27: de 'og t'a re rab tu sbyar //
T02D3685:316a-29: sv'a h'a'i mtha' can las kun byed //
T02D3685:316a-30: thugs ka'i 'khor lo de las 'od zer dkar po
T02D3685:316a-31: 'phros pas dam tshig sems dpa' 'dra ba'i ye shes
T02D3685:316a-32: sems dpa' rang bzhin gyis grub pa kun nas spyan
T02D3685:316a-33: drangs pa mdun gyi nam mkha' la rnam par bsams
T02D3685:316a-34: nas / snga ma bzhin du yang dag par mchod de /
T02D3685:316a-35: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3685:316a-36: thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis
T02D3685:316a-37: gung mo gnyis kyi rgyab tu sbyar la mthe bong
T02D3685:316a-38: gnyis nang du bkug pa ni /
T02D3685:316a-40: de'i dbus su yi ge t'am dkar po bsams te /
T02D3685:316a-41: de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros pa des ye shes sems dpa' la bskor bar byas la /
T02D3685:316a-42: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis
T02D3685:316a-43: spyan drangs nas dam tshig sems dpa' bdag nyid la
T02D3685:316a-44: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /
T02D3685:316b-0: aom dharma dh'a @316b tu dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko&amp ;
T02D3685:316b-3: de'i rjes la 'khor lo yi ger bcas pa las 'od zer spro ba byas la /
T02D3685:316b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mdun gyi nam mkha' la rnam par bsams la /
T02D3685:316b-5: dbang bskur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don du gnyer bar bya ba ste /
T02D3685:316b-6: byang chub rdo rjes sangs rgyas la //
T02D3685:316b-7: ji ltar mchog chen stsol mdzad pa //
T02D3685:316b-8: bdag la bsrung ba'i don gyi phyir //
T02D3685:316b-9: nam mkha'i rdo rje deng bdag stsol //
T02D3685:316b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku las byung ba'i lo ts'a na dang /
T02D3685:316b-13: t'a ra rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtsis bkang ba phyag na bsnams pas /
T02D3685:316b-14: rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D3685:316b-15: khams gsum po yis phyag byas pa //
T02D3685:316b-16: gsang ba gsum gyi gnas las byung //
T02D3685:316b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D3685:316b-18: zhes bya ba 'don cing dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
T02D3685:316b-19: dbang bskur ba rdzogs ma thag tu rin po che'i
T02D3685:316b-20: cod pan gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa 'od
T02D3685:316b-21: dpag tu med pa sku mdog dkar po zhal gcig
T02D3685:316b-22: phyag gnyis pa / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya can bsam mo //
T02D3685:316b-23: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3685:316b-24: spyi bor yi ge aom dkar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang /
T02D3685:316b-25: lkog mar yi ge a'a:dmar po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa dang /
T02D3685:316b-26: snying gar yi ge h'um nag po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnam par bkod do //
T02D3685:316b-27: yi ge bcu po las 'od zer dkar po spros
T02D3685:316b-28: pas 'gro ba kun sbyangs nas sangs rgyas su bsgrubs
T02D3685:316b-30: 'khor lo dang yi ge la bstims te gsal bar bsgom zhing bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D3685:316b-31: ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom pa dang
T02D3685:316b-32: bzlas par byas nas de las ldang bar 'dod na
T02D3685:316b-33: cho ga nyams pa bskang bar bya ba'i phyir rdo
T02D3685:316b-35: yi ge brgya pa zhes bya ba bzlas nas ye
T02D3685:316b-36: shes sems dpa' yang dag par mchod bsod nams yongs
T02D3685:316b-37: su bsngos la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D3685:316b-38: de la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T02D3685:317a-2: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
T02D3685:317a-3: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni //
T02D3685:317a-4: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D3685:317a-6: de la bzlas pa'i sngags ni /
T02D3685:317a-7: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3685:317a-8: de la rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po yi ge brgya pa'i sngags ni /
T02D3685:317a-9: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya /
T02D3685:317a-12: tishtha dri dho me bha ba /
T02D3685:317a-13: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D3685:317a-14: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D3685:317a-15: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D3685:317a-20: bha ga w'an sarbba ta th'a ga ta /
T02D3685:317a-22: badzri bha ba ma h'a sa ma ya satva a'a:/
T02D3685:317a-25: rje btsun sgrol ma 'dra bar shog / bdag kyang ting 'dzin 'di bsgrubs nas //
T02D3685:317a-26: 'gro ba'i don du sangs rgyas shog /
T02D3685:317a-27: rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po
T02D3685:317a-28: dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D3685:317a-30: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D3685:317a-31: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong dge ba'i blo
